org.at4j.tar

Class TarEntryNameGlobFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.entityfs.support.filter.AbstractConvenientFilter<TarEntryHeaderData>
      • org.at4j.tar.TarEntryNameGlobFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, TarEntryHeaderDataFilter, org.entityfs.support.filter.ConvenientFilter<TarEntryHeaderData>, org.entityfs.support.filter.Filter<TarEntryHeaderData>

    public final class TarEntryNameGlobFilter
extends org.entityfs.support.filter.AbstractConvenientFilter<TarEntryHeaderData>
implements TarEntryHeaderDataFilter
    This filter matches Tar entries with names that match a Glob pattern. It can be used with the TarExtractor.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Karl Gustafsson
    See Also:
    TarExtractor, TarExtractSpecification
